attributes.action: We want to save Rainham library in Kent from possible demolition
attributes.additional_details: The library in Rainham is one of the few old buildings we have left in Rainham and so many of us would like to see it continue to stand for the use of the general public.
attributes.background: Please help preserve this popular building and Rainham landmark from demolition

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
